modName: Master of Weapons - Lumberjacks Hook And Saw
summary: The hook used at lumber mills can be used as a weapon!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36489-1-1369735171.png[/img]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/36489-2-1369735171.png[/img]
Hey Guys,
This is part of a number of mods i am going to make, where little things around skyrim which have no use will be given, a use.

this is just a little mod i made, where you can use the hooks as weapons.
stats are similar to Steel Dagger.
they are craftable at a forge,(under Steel).
i also added a hook-claw. see how you like it..
next i am going to do embalming tools.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Try out the fishing pole mod at:                              http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36467/?
Try out the embalming tools mod at:                       http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36503/?
Try out the Woodcutters hook and claw mod at:  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36489/?
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
*and yes, i know the title is ridiculous*
author: Daren
